LanguageData.Apparel_winter_petticoat.label: winter petticoat
LanguageData.Apparel_winter_petticoat.description: It is a children's clothing with a shoulder cape, and was mainly worn by Baekrang children.
LanguageData.Apparel_winter_earmuffs.label: children winter earmuffs
LanguageData.Apparel_winter_earmuffs.description: These are children's winter earmuffs worn by children.
LanguageData.Apparel_HakurohParka_children.label: children moonlight parka
LanguageData.Apparel_HakurohParka_children.descriptio: It is a parka made with the design of moonlight, and it is a parka worn by Baekrang children in the cold snowfield.
LanguageData.Apparel_desert_manteau.label: children desert cloak
LanguageData.Apparel_desert_manteau.description: A desert cape that can withstand high temperatures. It is a desert cape worn by Baekrang children in hot areas.
